amendment.description: To require a report on the replacement of the security forces and communications training facility at Frances S. Gabreski Air National Guard Base, New York.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4177 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4177 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4177 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4177 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Schumer.
